A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disappointed!  I couldn't get emotionally invested in this movie.  I wanted to be scared by the villains - I wasn't; I wanted to cheer for the heroes - I didn't.  None of the new characters (Holdo\, Rose\, Benecio del Toro) was exciting or interesting.  The pacing of the movie did not work well.  The gratuitous action scenes were boring.  Please bring back the master storytelling that makes a movie - not just a great Star Wars movie.
